content: WASHINGTON The U.S. consumer bureau and the Navajo Nation filed charges on Tuesday against companies and executives they say used H&R Block franchises to operate an illegal tax-refund scheme.
name: H&R Block Inc
title: U.S. consumer bureau charges firms in tax refund scheme targeting Navajos

content: WASHINGTON  April 14 The U.S. consumer bureau and the Navajo Nation filed charges on Tuesday against companies and executives they say used H&R Block franchises to operate an illegal tax-refund scheme.
name: H&R Block Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 2-U.S. consumer bureau charges firms in tax refund scheme targeting Navajos

content: H&R Block Inc expects a boost from new U.S. tax forms required under President Barack Obama's healthcare law and from new clients seeking the company's help  Chief Executive Officer Bill Cobb told Reuters on Wednesday.
name: H&R Block Inc
title: H&R Block to see Obamacare boost: CEO
